page.title: 13RELIGION
page.content: Eastwood district has many examples of magnificent stone built churches representing most denominations of the Christian faith .These churches are well attended by both young and old alike . Over the last 50 years there have been 2 major migrations of ethnic minorities into the area .The first was a large influx of Jews who settled so well in the area that there are 2 synagogues ,one orthodox and the other reformed .The second migration is of much more recent origin .Many people from India and Pakistan have recently taken up residence in the area ,bringing with them their own religions and customs .The area now is of a mixture of beliefs and traditions , all of which live happily side by side in friendly integration . { Pages 11-13 by Robslee Primary 7
